Posts.Content: Mar 18, 2008 10:35PM PamGiGi wrote: Hi everyone, I need to join this group.  I will be starting rads soon and go for the mapping,etc. Thursday.  Sure sounds like fun...anyway it will help to talk over all the craziness we will be going through.  I guess I need to go shopping for aloe vera gel, lotions and bigger cotton bras.  I wonder if I will be able to go to the coast a week or so after all the treatments.  I love the sun and beach and can't wait to go.  What do you think? Pam
